General.Name: Globe Union Industrial Corp
General.Description: Globe Union Industrial Corp. manufactures and sells plumbing products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers faucets, showerheads, and vitreous products; fixtures and fittings, valves, and other plumbing related products; sanitary ceramic wares; kitchen and bathroom products; and accessories. The company markets its products under the Gerber, Prima, Lenz, RefleXion, and Bathroom To Love brands. It serves as an OEM source of products. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
